0.0: ATK increased by <cryo>12%</cryo>. For every party member with the same Elemental Type as the wielder (including the wielder themselves), gain 1 Gimmick stack. For every party member with a different Elemental Type from the wielder, gain 1 Theatrics stack. When the wielder has 1/2/3 or more Gimmick stacks, ATK will be increased by <cryo>8%/16%/40%</cryo>. When the wielder has 1/2/3 or more Theatrics stacks, Movement SPD will be increased by <cryo>4%/7%/10%</cryo>.
